title: Briefs
description:
Underwear or swim briefs. The swimming variety are often called 'Speedos' after the brand. This emoji is shown in different colors and styles across platforms. Some platforms depict this emoji as tighty whities with a visible fly, while others use a less specific design.

Related emojis include ðŸ‘™ Bikini, ðŸ©³ Shorts, and ðŸ©± One-Piece Swimsuit.
apple_vendor_description: On Apple devices, the briefs emoji presents a pair of simple, white underpants rendered with soft, rounded edges and a subtle 3D effect. Apple's signature realistic lighting creates gentle shadows, giving the fabric a soft, tactile appearance. This emoji typically conveys a sense of informality, personal comfort, or can be used humorously in a lighthearted context.
